array.string: What is Organic Parking?
Organic Parking is a mobile app that allows users to exchange information about public or private parking spaces. It will help facilitate a better city driving and parking experience.
What platforms is the app available?
Organic Parking is currently available on any Android- and iOS-run devices. Our goal is to make it available to as many users as possible.
How do I request a spot?
Simply tap on a pin of the spot you want and send a request.
How do I post a spot?

Press and hold your finger on the map until the "post here" icon appears. Move the map to the desired location and select "post here". Provide the date and time the spot will be available. Set your price. Give any aditional details. Post your spot and wait for someone to send you a request.
What do the different pins mean?
Blue pins with a dollar amount show available spots; a Pink pin is the spot you posted; and, a pin with a car image show you are in agreement.
What kinds of restrictions on parking are indicated in the app?

The poster of the spot is asked to show whether it is a metered, permit only, time limited, or unrestricted spot. But it is the responsibility of the driver to use the parking space legally, such as, by feeding the parking meter, having a parking permit, or observing the time limits.
How do I get paid?
You get paid via your bank or venmo account. Funds may take up to 72 hours to be transferred
How do I pay?
You pay using a credit or debit card. Organic Parking does not keep your credit card information.
What is venmo?

Venmo is a third party app which allows a poster to receive money easily and securely to you by entering an email or phone number. We don't keep any access to your venmo account - we just need to know where to send the money to.
Why did I not receive my full posted value?
There is a fee of 2.9% of the posted value plus 30 cents applied to funds handled by the payment processing company. Please see https://www.braintreepayments.com
Do I pay a commission to organic parking?
Organic Parking does not take a commission at this time.
What do I do if I am running late?
Notify the poster via the chat immediately and try to rearrange the timing.
I requested a spot, but never received any response from the poster. What should I do?
Cancel your request and look for another spot on the map.
I'm in another app. Can I still get messages?
No worries, Organic Parking alerts you by push notifications.
